items.name: Atziri's Foible
explicitMods: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric.
We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White.
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same.
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

items.name: Replica Kaom's Heart
flavourText: "Useless for our purposes, but perhaps we can sell Prototype #5
to an archmage to fund other experiments."

items.name: Ceinture of Benevolence
explicitMods: Non-Unique Utility Flasks you Use apply to Linked Targets
flavourText: "Put your faith in me.
Our god demands it."
- High Templar Maxarius

items.name: Shavronne's Revelation
explicitMods: Right ring slot: You cannot Regenerate Mana
Right ring slot: Regenerate 6% of Energy Shield per second
Right ring slot: +300 to maximum Mana
Left ring slot: You cannot Recharge or Regenerate Energy Shield
Left ring slot: Regenerate 48 Mana per Second
Left ring slot: +250 to maximum Energy Shield
flavourText: "Shavronne held Sanity in her right
hand and Revelation in her left.
Brutus chose the left hand."
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

items.name: Memory Vault
flavourText: Your memories are a bridge to the past.
Let no one cross.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 217 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 33 Mana per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 25% more Physical Damage
Supported Skills deal no Chaos Damage
Supported Skills deal no Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 10% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Aegis Aurora
explicitMods: Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block
17% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flavourText: Born from the marriage of ice and sky,
the aurora evokes both awe and power.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Targets an allied player to apply a buff which links you to them for a duration. While linked, your Energy Shield will intercept some of the damage they would take. If the target dies while linked, you will also die. This skill cannot be triggered, or used by Totems, Traps, or Mines.
explicitMods: 30% of Damage from Hits against target is taken from your Energy Shield before them

Link breaks if target leaves range or line of sight for 4 seconds
Maximum 1 Link from any source per target
You die if Linked target dies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
